article_title: As Specialty Pharmacy Evolves, Armada Health Care Changes Name To Asembia

article_metadata.description: Armada Health Care has changed its name to Asembia to reflect its broadening business portfolio and the rapidly growing and changing specialty pharmacy business, a complex industry of complex medications to both delivery to patients and pay for.
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
